job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pstrongSenior Machine Learning Engineer  Foxy AIstrongppbrppstrongRemote  Full TimestrongppbrppWe are a passionate team solving the most fundamental problems in real estate using AI to paint a complete picture of the home from the ground upppnbspppstrongJob DescriptionstrongppbrppstrongWHO WE ARE LOOKING FORstrongppbrppFoxy AI is looking for a Senior ML Engineer that is eager to build computer vision and ML models for real estate Foxy AI uses cuttingedge artificial intelligence and computer vision to convert everyday real estate photos into treasure troves of data Our models help investors startups and public companiesnbspstreamline workflows and improve quality assurance generate new insights and sharpen the accuracy of Automated Valuation Models AVMsnbspThis is an opportunity to get on the ground floor with a fastpaced team delivering revolutionary solutions to a longestablished industryppbrppConsulting with our ML advisor you will own our ML pipeline an integral piece of the product You will be responsible for building and productionizing new models from the ground up as well as expanding upon existing models You must have the ability to implement models in production to solve actual business problems You must have a comfortable understanding of Docker and Dockerizing microservices on GPUs interacting with our frontend React code optimizing our pipelines and deploying and maintaining on AWSppnbspppWere a small team so wearing many hats is necessary and we are looking for somebody who is both excited by the possibility of stepping into a new machine learning startup as a selfstarter and a quick learnernbspAs the team grows you will help recruit junior engineers and be responsible for managing those on your team The candidate would not only be a part of development but an integral part of the team contributing to ideas and IP of a webscale Computer Vision applicationnbspEveryone on the engineering team contributes to the full product visionnbspppnbspppYou should absolutely love what you doppnbspppbrppstrongCANDIDATE MUST HAVEstrongpulliThe candidate must have the ability to implement deep learning algorithms in production to solve actual business problemsliliIdeally 5 years of experience with deep learning and computer vision Experience with application in a product that has been commercializedliliThe ability to think at a high level about product strategy and visionliliSelfmotivated and able to efficiently run with a project without close supervisionliulpnbsppulliThe ability to research and develop novel algorithms to solve cutting edge computer vision problems such as semantic segmentation object recognition imagevideo understanding product recommendation Approximate Nearest Neighbor KNN indexes photogrammetry and SLAMliliStrong background in applied mathematics statistics and probabilityliliDeep familiarity with latest Deep Learning and Computer Vision techniques and librariesliliDeep familiarity with PythonliliDeep familiarity with AWS AWS Sagemaker and DockerliliDeep familiarity in handling and processing imagesliliComfortable with the popular deep learning frameworks like pytorch tensorflow and kerasliliStrong skills in written and verbal communication of technical conceptsliliExperience with LiDAR AR and 3D modeling is a plusliulpnbspppstrongJOB RESPONSIBILITIES strongpulliIdentify acquire generate process andor prepare relevant datasetsliliResearch and develop AIDLML algorithms to solve challenging computer vision tasksliliValidate algorithms andor models in a mathematically disciplined and statistically meaningful mannerliliProductionize algorithms to solve business problemsliliDevelop clear commented and understandable code for integration into production systemsliliDefine and document effective domain specific methodologiesliliGenerate and present analysis results and reports tailored to target audience scientists software engineers business strategists investors etcliliCollaborate with fellow scientists and software engineersliliCollaborate with fellow product engineers to put the AI model in product pipeline and implementationliulpbrppstrongWhat Were BuildingstrongppbrppFoxy solves critical pain points in real estate by turning property photos into treasure troves of data Our suite of AIpowered real estate tools available through our API can instantly compute quality and condition renovation costs detect objects and materials and more These tools help solve crucial problems in every aspect of the real estate businessppbrppwwwFoxyAIcomp
